titles.title: Because Of Love I Am A New Creation

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Because of love I am a new creation,
Because of God's redeeming love.
There is no pow'r too strong for love to conquer.
Praise God, praise God for His redeeming love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is a love that knows no bounds,
Its depths are yet untold.
It hopes, endures, believes all things;
It never will grow cold.

verse.name: v3
